title: Group Chat: The Best Way to Totally Stress Out Your Team
description: How Basecamp overcomes the negatives of group chat by encouraging asyncronous communication.

title: My best products are joke
description: When and how to use humor in copywriting.

title: Whereby
description: A video-conferencing app with a clean design. Works well in the web browser without any hustle and doesn't try to capture all the possible information from guests.

title: Intellectual Humility
description: An interesting read that investigates why it's hard to realize our own ignorance. The first rule of the Dunning-Kruger club is you don't know that you're a member.

title: Dense Discovery
description: My favorite weekly newsletter on technology, design and culture. Published by Kai Branch.

title: Chill Institute
description: A complementary service to enhance your put.io experience.

title: 7 Principles of Rich Web Applications
description: An article from Vercel's CEO Guillermo Rauch, dates back to 2014. It's fascinating to see where Next.js is now, after reading the ideological origins.
